title: News24.com | OPINION: Securitising Covid-19 may help stop the spread, but we must stay watchful of Big Brother
description: It is the responsibility of each person to remain watchful over their governments; to not be overly distracted by the pandemic to the point where legislation that further advances governments' powers are simply accepted, writes Danielle Hoffmeester.
